urls.description: The 71st Annual ICA Conference is mostly asynchronous with a few live events. Live events range from pre-recorded sessions released on a schedule and events that will be live over video chat. Reference the schedule below to see when the different live events are occurring. The actual links to the events will be available within the actual ICA Conference Website, released on 27 May. Protests and Public Diplomacy, Soft Power, Nation Branding 11:00 AM EDT | Live | Panel Session | Public Diplomacy OPENING

#ica21  @CalebTCarrPhD  personally and deeply thanks all our reviewers, especially those who provided substantive feedback and helped with last-minute reviewing. CAT‚Äôs top reviewer this year is @admeierlab

#ica21 This year‚Äôs reviewing came at a complex and difficult time; and we could not have done this enormous task without the efforts of the 301 scholars who reviewed for CAT. Our colleagues completed 770 reviews, all within a two-week timeframe.

#ica21 A total of 412 full papers were submitted to CAT for 2021 (a substantive increase from last year‚Äôs 259). Of these, 218 were accepted and programmed into traditional paper panels. An acceptance rate of 52.91%, compared to 62.54% for 2020 and the 55% accepted for 2019.
#ica21 number of accepted extended abstracts up to a total of 43, an acceptance rate of 34.4% (comparable to 34.74% in 2020 and 33.8% in 2019).
